summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." The text indicates a website operator's frustration with a scraper that is not respecting robots.txt directives and has been rate-limited. The bill encourages the scraper to comply with robots.txt and directs it to use the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service for data access, found at https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/bulkdata/. The bill essentially provides guidance on responsible web scraping practices and the preferred method for obtaining government data.
